fields.name: The Temple of Ngurct
fields.description: Your king hires you to investigate the dangerous cult of the Priests of Ngurct in the ruins of an old citadel. Only by recovering the lost Medallion can you break the power of the black demon, Ngurct!
fields.intro_text:
There is an old ruin of a small citadel on a cliff overlooking a rarely used pass.  The road through the pass has become increasingly hazardous in recent years. Now, only rash and desperate travelers -- or those travelling in very large parties -- dare to use it.

Those who have survived the crossing tell dark tales of fearsome beasts, kidnappings, and strange happenings. In all these tales, the citadel is the eye of the storm. 

It is believed that the evil priests of Ngurct have occupied the citadel. Their foul creed worships the black demon of the same name.  Ngurct is the patron demon of exotic monsters â€“ and he requires the regular sacrifice of human unbelievers.

Ngurct is associated with Nektor, god of the undead.

---

You have been hired by your king to eradicate this scourge, and make the pass safe for travel and commerce once again.

Legend has it that the power of Ngurct is locked into a gold medallion.  If you return the medallion to the king, the power of Ngurct will be broken.

It is also rumoured that Ngurct himself abides in the citadel, though it is not known in what form. For your efforts, you will be paid 5,000 gp upon the return of the medallion. And, of course, you will get to keep any loot you find.

Good luck!

fields.name: at the main entrance (N/S/E)
fields.description: The citadel stands before you; much of it in ruins. The east tower is collapsed. You can go north through the main gate or along a path to the east. To the south is the road to the Main Hall.

fields.name: in the courtyard (N/S)
fields.description: The courtyard is littered with fire-blackened rubble. To the north is a road, and the main citadel gate is to the south. To the east and west are tower walls that you can't climb.

fields.name: in the west tower (N/U)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of the west tower. It is in far better shape than the east tower. A set of stairs leaps up.

fields.name: in the barracks (S/E)
fields.description: You are in the abandoned barracks. Old rotting bunks stand against the walls. Rats skitter across the floor.

fields.name: in the armoury (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the armoury. It has seen no business for some time; you are begining to wonder if there's anyone alive here. The only light is starlight from a gaping hole in the roof.

fields.name: in the headquarters (S/W)
fields.description: You are in the headquarters. This room alone in the citadel looks lived in.

fields.name: in the east tower (N/E/D)
fields.description: You are in the ruins of the east tower. There is a big breach in the east wall; the loose rubble looks treacherous. An old but still-clear stairway leads down.

fields.name: on the top of the tower (D)
fields.description: You are on the top of the west tower. You have a beautiful view of an ugly, narrow pass, and see little else.

fields.name: on an east/west path
fields.description: You are on a path just to the east of the citadel's main entrance.

fields.name: at a north/west bend in the path
fields.description: The path here looks well travelled; no vegetation grows on it. To the west the path leads toward the citadel entrance. To the north is the rubble of a breach in the east wall.

fields.name: in the breach (S/W)
fields.description: You are in the breach in the east wall. The stones and rubble are loose and dangerous. To the west you see the ruins of the east tower. A path leads south.

fields.name: at the east end of a road (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are at the east end of an east/west road. It looks as though it has seen regular use, mostly to the ruined tower to the south.

fields.name: on an east/west road (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a short east/west road. To the north is a large building. The road looks heavily travelled to the east, unused to the west. To the south is the main courtyard.

fields.name: at the west end of a road (N/S/E)
fields.description: The road ends here between a tower to the south and a building to the north. The road leads back east toward the courtyard.

fields.name: at the north end of a hallway (S/E/W)
fields.description: The hallway ends here, with doors leading east and west. You hear voices from behind the east door.

fields.name: in a north/south hall
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. The hall continues in both directions. The walls are rough and contain several small holes.

fields.name: in a north/south hall with doors east and west
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. To the south is a bend in the hall; to the north the hall leads out of sight. There are doors in the east and west walls.

fields.name: at a north/west bend
fields.description: You are in a dry, cool underground hallway. The walls are dry, and there are flickering torches securely bolted to the walls. The stonework is very old, and the mortar is crumbling.

fields.name: in an east/west hall with door south
fields.description: You are in an east/west hall. To the east and west you see bends in the hall. There is a door to the south.

fields.name: at a north/east bend
fields.description: You are at a north/east bend in the hall. You can see doors south and west as well.

fields.name: in a north/south hall with doors east and west
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. You can smell strange smells from under the door to the west. There is also a door east.

fields.name: at the north end of a hall (N/S/E)
fields.description: There is a door to the north which you can both see and smell; the odour coming from under it is appalling. The door to the east also smells -- it of dust, mold and age.

fields.name: at the east end of a hall (E/W)
fields.description: You are at the east end of a hall. To the east is a truly awful-smelling room. West is a bend in the hall. The north wall is covered with strange, filigreed cracks.

fields.name: at a south/east bend
fields.description: The hallway bends here, going south and east. A large, heavy wooden door leads west. From under it comes a peculiar musky odour. You see more cracks on the north wall.

fields.name: in a north/south hall
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. To the east is a thick wooden door. Along the hallway to the south, you see a series of doors.

fields.name: in a north/south hall
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. To both the east and west you see stong cell doors. You see more such doors down the hall to the south.

fields.name: in a north/south hall
fields.description: You are in a north/south hall. To both the east and west you see cell doors; similar doors lie up the hall to the north.

fields.name: outside the temple (N/S)
fields.description: You're at the south end of a north/south hallway. To the north, the hallway leads out of sight, past a series of doors. To the south lies a huge door of graven stone, carved with horrible monsters and grotesque demons.

fields.name: at the west end of a tunnel (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the west end of an east/west tunnel. It is only slightly damp, and it looks newer than the rest of the citadel (which isn't saying much). The torchlight is dim here, but you can see doors to the north, south, and west, with a tunnel leading east.

fields.name: in a tunnel (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west tunnel. To the south lies a door.

fields.name: in the tunnel (S/E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel continues. To the east you see a bend; south is a door.

fields.name: at a north/west bend
fields.description: You are at a north/west bend in the tunnel. To the west is a long dim tunnel. You see a strange door to the north; it feels warm to the touch. It opens inward, and evidently can only be opened from the inside.

fields.name: in the bottom of the stairs (N/U)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a staircase. It is very dark here; the only light is that coming down the staircase.

fields.name: in the barracks (N/W)
fields.description: You are in the east half of a large barracks. There are bunks for about two dozen humanoids. It is fairly well lit.

fields.name: in the barracks (N/E)
fields.description: You are in the west half of a large barracks. There are bunks for about two dozen humanoids, some very large. The place is a total mess.

fields.name: in the officers' room (E)
fields.description: You are in the officers' quarters. The room is very neat and tidy; the bed is made with military corners. The light is very bright, by dungeon standards.

fields.name: in the mess hall (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the mess hall. It lives up to (or down to) its name. The floor is strewn with rotting straw, and the table tops are coated with grime and garbage.

fields.name: in Alkanda's tomb (W)
fields.description: You are in an ancient, dusty tomb. In the center of the room is an elaborate stone sarcophagus; its stone lid lies shattered to one side. The room is thick with dust. The south wall bears an inscription in hieroglyphics. The only exit is west.

fields.name: in a filthy room (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a filthy room. The walls are covered with slime and mold; the floor is deep in garbage, refuse and rat dung. Doors lead south, east, and west.

fields.name: in the storeroom (W)
fields.description: You are in a storeroom. The light is dim, but you can see that the room is piled high with boxes and crates of orc clothes and (worthless) whatnots. The exit is west.

fields.name: in the treasury (S)
fields.description: You are in the treasury. It is a small room, but a full one. A door leads south.

fields.name: in the magic lab (E)
fields.description: You are in the magic lab. Intricate glassware stands on tables and racks; a number of potions are on a shelf. Books and notes lie strewn about. A door leads east.

fields.name: in the library (W)
fields.description: You are in the library. The titles on the collection run mostly to theological material, with no fiction at all. The exit is a door to the west.

fields.name: in the northwest cell (E)
fields.description: You are in the north-west cell. The floor is covered with crumbling, rotten straw. A door leads east.

fields.name: in the northeast cell (W)
fields.description: You are in the north-east cell. There is a shallow hole in the north wall, not even deep enough to hide a cup. It appears new. You see the cell door to the west.

fields.name: in the southwest cell (E)
fields.description: You are in the south-west cell. The floor is neatly swept; a pallet of woven straw lies in the north corner. To the east is the cell door.

fields.name: in the southeast cell (W)
fields.description: You are in the south-east cell. On the floor is a thick layer of foul and reeking sawdust. To the west is the cell door.

fields.name: in the Temple of Ngurct (N)
fields.description: You are in the main temple. The walls are painted with pictures of grotesque monsters in evil acts -- breathing fire, terrorizing villagers, and so forth. You see a black stone altar at the south end of the room.

fields.name: in the supply room (N/E)
fields.description: You are in the ecclesiastical supply room. Here is kept the equipment the priests need for their pernicious rites. Exits are north and east.

fields.name: in the lavatory (S)
fields.description: You are in the priests' lavatory. You see a huge stone tub, spotlessly clean, a basin, and a large smelly hole in the floor. A door leads south.

fields.name: in the high priest's bedroom (N)
fields.description: You are in the high priest's bedroom. A dead girl lies on the bed; the satin sheets are stiff with the still-warm blood from her ragged throat. The walls are painted with a powdery, red-brown paint. The only exit is a door to the north.

fields.name: in a priest's bedroom (N)
fields.description: You are in a priest's bedroom. The room is neat and orderly; it is also bare and spartan. The only exit is a door to the north.

fields.name: in a priest's bedroom (N)
fields.description: You are in a priest's bedroom. The bed is rumbled and dishevled. The ceiling and walls are mirrored; the only light is from a fading orange brazier of coals. The only exit is a door to the north.

fields.name: in the kitchen (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the kitchen. You see the first happy creatures you've found here; a swarm of contented flies buzz around the room. Doors lead east and west.

fields.name: in the big cell (N)
fields.description: You are in a big cell. The floor is covered with reeking sawdust. The walls are bare native stone, dripping with ground water. You see the cell door to the north.

fields.name: in the torture chamber (S/W)
fields.description: You are in the torture chamber. The east wall is dominated by a worn rack. From behind a cell door to the south come imploring cries -- 'Free us!' Another door leads west.

fields.name: in a storeroom (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an empty storeroom. There is nothing on the floor, but for a few old crates and bits of wood. You see a tall vertical slit in the north wall, and a matching room-long slit in the ceiling. Exits lead east and west.

fields.name: in 'the lost room'
fields.description: You are in 'the lost room.' it has no exits. You are not in the universe. You are not dead, but you are not free to leave. You are doomed. 'it could be worse...'

fields.name: in the minotaur room (E)
fields.description: You are in a large room that stinks of musk and sweat. The floor is worn by countless large hoofprints and covered with hay and bovine droppings. The walls are hewn from the living rock, and the room is damp and chill. A door leads east.

fields.name: in the latrine
fields.description: Nice going! You just fell down the latrine! The walls are smooth, the sewage is deep, and you drown a horrible death!

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a standard sword.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see an axe

fields.name: huge mace
fields.description: You see a huge mace about 6 feet long.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a mace

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see a standard spear.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: On south wall is a cell door locked with a huge padlock.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: On the north wall is a heavy cell door.

fields.name: secret door north
fields.description: Close examination of the cracks reveal a secret door to the north!

fields.name: secret door south
fields.description: Examining the altar, you find a lever that opens a secret door to the south!

fields.name: spear trap
fields.description: You see a spear trap, set up to trigger when you walk through the door.

fields.name: long sword
fields.description: You see Joubert's sword.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: You see a cell door in the east wall.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: You see a cell door in the west wall.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: You see a cell door in the west wall.

fields.name: cell door
fields.description: You see a cell door in the east wall.

fields.name: oak door
fields.description: You see a strong oak door in the south wall.

fields.name: oak door
fields.description: You see a strong oak door in the north wall.

fields.name: book
fields.description: You see a very old book, left lying out on a table.  It's open to the dedication page, which reads: 'To all followers of Ngurct, to whom these secrets are known' There's more in the book than that, but just looking at the illustrations on the page gives you the creeps.

fields.name: poker
fields.description: You see a red-hot poker

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a sword.

fields.name: Bloodthirst
fields.description: You see Bloodthirst, a vicious red and black sword with blood stains on it.

fields.name: Necronis
fields.description: You see Necronis, a black sword wielded by the priestess.

fields.name: Wrath of Ngurct
fields.description: You see "Wrath of Ngurct," the high priest's sword. The blade seems to pulse and quiver. The hilt is inlaid with rubies.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see an axe.

fields.name: loose stone
fields.description: You see a loose stone in the floor. Someone has moved it to a precarious position as a makeshift pit trap.

fields.name: gas trap
fields.description: You see a gas nozzle in the wall, part of a nasty-looking trap.

fields.name: blade trap
fields.description: The large slit conceals a spinning saw blade that will sweep out of the wall whenever someone moves past.

fields.name: crossbow trap
fields.description: You see a crossbow trap set up in the wall.

fields.name: hieroglyphics
fields.description: The south wall bears an inscription in hieroglyphics.

fields.name: sarcophagus
fields.description: You see a large stone sarcophagus. It was once fairly sturdy but now the lid is shattered beyond repair. The inside smells of centuries-old dust.

fields.name: dead mage
fields.description: You see a body on the floor; it is that of a dead mage. His clothing is badly burned and his head hangs by but a thread. His throat is ripped out. In his hand you see a blood-stained wand.

fields.name: fireball wand
fields.description: You see a magic wand. From the scorch marks on it, you deduce that it's a fireball wand.

fields.name: double-bladed axe
fields.description: You see the minotaur's double-bladed axe on the ground. It is highly polished steel; the edge is hard and razor-sharp. Four sapphires (uncut) adorn the hilts.

fields.name: ankh
fields.description: The mummy drops the silver ankh it clutched in deathbed irony.

fields.name: crossbow
fields.description: You see the lieutenant's crossbow. It has some evil-looking symbols engraved on the stock.

fields.name: Medallion of Ngurct
fields.description: You see a gold medallion with a truly hideous monster's -- face? -- on it: Fangs dripping gore, and all that. Its chain is broken, and it's lying next to the demised girl on the bed.

fields.name: Belisarius' sword
fields.description: You see a finely-wrought but unornamented sword.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: You see a jeweled dagger.

fields.name: Gonzales' sword
fields.description: You see Gonzales' sword. It's a good off-the-rack sword.

fields.name: Alkanda's scimitar
fields.description: You see Alkanda's scimitar. The blade is black and wickedly curved. The hilt is studded with dark gems -- opals, dark sapphire, stygian beryl. The grip is wrapped with human leather.

fields.name: Hero's sword
fields.description: You see Hero's sword. It's a huge two-handed broadsword; the blade is five feet long. The hilt is heavy, hammered brass, and bears a single diamond.

fields.name: frying pan
fields.description: You see a frying pan.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: You see a rusty short sword.

fields.name: coins
fields.description: You see a mess of silver, copper and a couple gold coins on a bunk.

fields.name: copper coins
fields.description: There's a pile of copper coins by one of the old bunks.

fields.name: copper ingots
fields.description: You see five copper ingots on a table.

fields.name: bag of silver coins
fields.description: There's a bag of silver coins on the table.

fields.name: idol
fields.description: You see a foot-tall black stone idol of a truly hideous monster; its fangs are bared and dripping, its talons curled to strike, its eyes glowing with a hidden fire.

fields.name: statue
fields.description: You see a statue of a truly hideous monster; its fangs bared and dripping gore, its talons curled to strike, its eyes glowing with a hidden fire. It is so well crafted, it looks almost alive.

fields.name: brown potion
fields.description: You see a brown potion with a label that says 'Healing Potion'.

fields.name: red potion
fields.description: You see a thick, sticky red potion in an umarked vial.

fields.name: yellow potion
fields.description: You see a yellow potion in a vial with some markings scratched on it.

fields.name: chest
fields.description: You see a large chest, wrapped with iron bands and locked with a steel padlock.

fields.name: gold bars
fields.description: You see a glittering stack of gold bars.

fields.name: sack
fields.description: You see a bulging sack prominently labelled 'GOLD COINS.'

fields.name: semi-precious stones
fields.description: You see a collection of semi-precious stones by a bunk -- agates, and jasper, and jade.

fields.name: coins
fields.description: You see a slew of copper and silver coins that were spilled when you walked in.

fields.name: stickpin
fields.description: You see a ruby stickpin on the officer's uniform lapel.

fields.name: black potion
fields.description: You see a black potion in a cracked vial with the label scratched off.

fields.name: ring
fields.description: On the mage's finger you see a golden ring; it bears a ruby that glints and flickers. On the inside is an insription in odd but readable script.

fields.name: scarab
fields.description: You find a silver scarab in the sarcophagus!

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: A scintillating pile of uncut, polished diamonds attracts your attention.

fields.name: carcass
fields.description: You see a carcass roasting on a spit. Somehow the haunch looks familiar.

fields.name: roast pig
fields.description: You see a steaming roast pig, just out of the oven.

fields.name: wine
fields.description: You see a flagon of wine on the table. A whiff near takes your head off.

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: You see an iron key hanging from a peg on the wall.

fields.name: keys
fields.description: You see a ring of keys on the table by the book.

fields.name: ring of keys
fields.description: You find a ring of keys under the dead guard's body.

fields.name: steel key
fields.description: You see a steel key glinting in a corner.

fields.name: silver dagger
fields.description: You see an intricately crafted silver dagger.

fields.name: silk robes
fields.description: You see an assortment of beautiful silk robes on a rack against the wall.

fields.name: blade blanks
fields.description: A stack of old, rusty blade blanks leans against one wall. They're still in good shape.

fields.name: sacrificial dagger
fields.description: You see the sacrificial dagger of ngurct on the ground; the hilt and grip are jeweled; the deeply fluted blade is made of solid gold.

fields.name: candelabra
fields.description: You see a gold candelabra; it has held stinking blood-red candles before; it is covered with old wax.

fields.name: sapphire ring
fields.description: You see a ring set with a large faceted sapphire on a table by the bed.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: You a dazzling assortment of jewels of every type and color; emeralds, rubies, diamonds, sapphires, moonstones, beryls, crafted into necklaces, brooches, jeweled daggers:  lots and lots of goodies.

fields.text: The inscription is in strange, foreign symbols. You find that you can read them, however. They seem to speak to you...

"This is the crypt of the great Alkanda, right hand of Ngurct on earth. The body of Alkanda, though embalmed, is still vulnerable; but his spirit will live forever.  The spirit of the great Alkanda can once again be made to manifest itself in this world. If an infidel, of his own free will, holds the gold medallion of Ngurct and says the words of power:
The reward shall be beyond the reach of the immortal gods!"
You hear a rasping voice, hissing all around you: â€œYou mortal fool! Dare you attempt to learn the secrets of Ngurct? For your temerity, you are banished from this world!â€
You trigger a spear trap in the wall!
A loose stone gives way beneath your feet. You land in a shallow pit with a jarring blow to your ankles!
A jet of green gas shoots from a hole in the wall! It chokes you and brings tears to your eyes.
A scything blade sweeps out of the slit!
The statue comes alive as you approach it, howling in pain and roaring with anger. I think you're in trouble!

fields.name: Rat
fields.description: You see a group of giant rats with sharp teeth.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a big, nasty looking guy with a sword that's seen lots of use. He turns to use it.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a man wearing the uniform of the guards of ngurct. He sees you, too, and readies his axe.

fields.name: Ogre
fields.description: You see an ogre, all eight feet of him, with black and red splotches all over his body. He says, 'ungh,' and turns to face you.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a big guy with a big mace. He doesn't like your looks.

fields.name: Goblin
fields.description: You see a goblin in shining chainmail. He sees you and readies his spear.

fields.name: Debbie
fields.description: A beatiful young woman stumbles into the room. Her clothing is torn and she looks like she hasn't eaten in days. She says she escaped from the priests and is looking for a way out.

fields.name: Zombie
fields.description: A mindless zombie shambles toward you.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: You see a disgusting, dirty orc wearing war paint.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see one of the temple guards of Ngurct. He has a crazed look in his eyes.

fields.name: Goblin
fields.description: There is a nasty-looking goblin here.

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: You see a disgusting, hairy bugbear.

fields.name: Joubert
fields.description: You see a shabby-looking man wearing tattered old leather armor and carrying a sword. He wears the colors of a Free Adventurer.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: A mean, foul-smelling orc charges at you!

fields.name: Hobgoblin
fields.description: A passing hobgoblin sees you and comes running up with a fierce look it its eyes.

fields.name: Giant
fields.description: A huge giant stands before you, his head nearly touching the ceiling.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see one of the temple guards of Ngurct. He has a crazed look in his eyes.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: A passing orc drops the bone he was gnawing on and runs toward you!

fields.name: Goblin
fields.description: There is a nasty-looking goblin here, looking menacingly at you.

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: A mean, hairy bugbear comes toward you.

fields.name: Sumata
fields.description: You see a man in Japanese garb. He is unarmed but looks like he could handle himself without a weapon. He seems friendly.

fields.name: Zapata
fields.description: Zapata, one of the prisoners, welcomes you to his humble home.

fields.name: Sir Charles
fields.description: One of the prisoners is the good Sir Charles, who wears the tattered remnants of his clothes with noble dignity. 'Greetings, sir', says he, 'and about time.'

fields.name: Thera
fields.description: You see a beautiful princess bound to the altar. She was obviously the high priest's next sacrifice. When you distract the priest, she is able to free herself and grab the sacrificial dagger.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: A guard straightens up from the brazier. He sees you and pulls a red-hot poker from the coals.

fields.name: Lieutenant
fields.description: You see a man in the uniform of the guards of Ngurct, but he's wearing some strange insignia. He's also holding a powerful-looking crossbow.

fields.name: Magician
fields.description: You see a small man with gray hair, wearing a conical hat with magical symbols on it. He is startled to see you, and seems panicked. He awkwardly readies a sword.

fields.name: Priest
fields.description: A man whirls from the bed. He is armed with a wicked sword, with which he was slicing up a slave girl. He turns, cries, 'How dare you, infidel!' and prepares to slice you up.

fields.name: High priest
fields.description: The high priest turns from the black and bloodstained altar. He carefully puts down the sacrificial dagger he was sharpening and whips out an elaborate sword. 'Those who defile the Temple of Ngurct -- die!'

fields.name: Priestess
fields.description: A priestess, clad in hooded black robes, turns from before a black statue to attack.

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: As you enter, a bugbear who was playing cards with an orc rises and readies its axe.

fields.name: Giant
fields.description: The loot is not unguarded, however. You see a giant, a truly large critter who looks at you and smiles. 'Mmmm,' he says. 'Food.'

fields.name: Goblin
fields.description: You are in combat! you have walked into the middle of a fight between a goblin and a handsome man.

fields.name: Hobgoblin
fields.description: You see the captain of the citadel outer guard -- a mid-sized hobgoblin (which is still pretty big). He is not at all pleased to see you.

fields.name: Kobold
fields.description: You see a frightened kobold standing indecisively by the rack.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: You see an orc.

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: An animated skeleton rattles out from amongst the rubble!

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: An animated skeleton rattles out of the rubble!

fields.name: Ghoul
fields.description: A ghoul attacks from the shadows!

fields.name: Minotaur
fields.description: A minotaur whirls to face you as you enter. He snorts, his huge shoulders bulging, and paws the ground with his feet. His swings his immense double-bladed axe and -- charges!

fields.name: Mummy
fields.description: You see the source of the musty smell shuffling towards you. It is a ragged mummy, wrapped head to toe in filthy bandages. He advances, shuffling, one arm reaching to grab you.

fields.name: Ogre
fields.description: An ogre, who was playing craps with the giant and being cheated, smiles an evil grin at the thought of venting his frustrations on you.

fields.name: Ogre
fields.description: An ogre advances from behind the altar.

fields.name: Belisarius
fields.description: Battling the goblin is a man in bright chain mail. 'Don't just stand there! Help me!' he cries.

fields.name: Abdul
fields.description: As you enter, a dark man rises to his feet. 'You are not a jailer,' he says. 'My name is Abdul.' He seems tense.

fields.name: Osborne
fields.description: A man lies weeping on the floor. â€œPlease don't hurt me again,â€ he whimpers. â€œI just don't want to be hurt. I'll do anything you want.â€ He turns, and jumps when he sees you.

fields.name: Cobra
fields.description: A cobra hisses, coiled on the jewels inside the chest!

fields.name: Ngurct
fields.description: You see the demon Ngurct! He is ten feet tall and has blood-red skin and wicked black claws. His eyes burn with the vilest light, and he looks fierce! He snarls at you in a guttural tongue and advances toward you.

fields.name: Slave girl
fields.description: You see a slave girl tied loosely to the bed. Her torso is criss-crossed with shallow lacerations.

fields.name: Gonzales
fields.description: A voice whispers, 'Pssst! Over here!' you look and see a dark man hiding in the rubble. 'Another guy after the reward on Princess Thera! Maybe we can work together, or...' He peers at you, sword at the ready.

fields.name: Alkanda
fields.description: A man in a black silk tunic steps from the cloud of dust. 'I'm alive!' he cries. 'Alive! Now i have the power of death!' He slides an evil sword from its scabbard. 'And for you? A just reward!'

fields.name: Hero
fields.description: From out of thin air leaps a norse barbarian, a lion's mane around his shoulders and a two handed broadsword in his hand. 'Hi! I'm Hero!'

fields.name: Troll
fields.description: A troll leaps out of the shadows!

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: You see a bugbear wearing a greasy apron and smoking a fat cigar. He hears you come in and turns, boredly, frying pan in hand. He sees you're not a moocher, exactly, and gets a death grip on the pan.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: The bugbear's competition scurries to his shiny orc-feet and grabs a short sword.

fields.question: How do I open the oak door?
I got teleported out of the universe! What do I do?
How do I use the fireball wand?

fields.answer: You'll have to look around for keys.
Try in the northwest part of the dungeon.
Try the POWER spell, the usual last resort in times like this.
A good bet is that the priests have it. Try looking at things in the room descriptions.
Examine the altar in the temple.
It requires a magic word that's fairly easy to guess.
Be careful what you drink. Read things before drinking them.
The fireball wand and ring are very useful, if you can find them. They are in a different place every time you play.
There are several traps in the dungeon, all of which can be avoided if you make a saving throw. Or, if you're clever enough to spot them and examine them before they go off, they will be disarmed.
The book, the statue, and any instructions you get from hieroglyphics are very dangerous.
